name: Ghost Town (itch) (hwall)
description:
Haunt the people using the arrow keys while avoiding the angry ghosts who want to possess you.

References I used while making this game:

- Dr. S.: for time delay, timing and game managing, and most importantly editing my code to make it actually run
- I made my own animations and graphics, but the ghosts are heavily influenced by Tio Dwiyanto's work on Shutterstock: https://www.shutterstock.com/image-vector/pixel-ghost-vector-illustration-165161...
- MolleIndustria: http://molleindustria.github.io/p5.play/examples/index.html?fileName=collisions4...
- Allison Parrish: https://creative-coding.decontextualize.com/making-games-with-p5-play/
